#include <iostream>
#include <sstream>
using namespace std;

int main(){
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int test;
	cin>>test;
	stringstream ss;
	while(test--){
		string a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		int len = a.length();
		bool all1 = true,all0 = true;
		for(int i=0;i<len;i++){
			if (a[i]=='0') all1 = false;
			if (a[i]=='1') all0 = false;
		}
		if (all1 || all0) ss<<"Unlucky Chef\n";
		else{
			int t10 = 0,t01 = 0;
			for(int i=0;i<len;i++){
				if (a[i]=='1' and b[i]=='0') t10++;
				else if (a[i]=='0' and b[i]=='1') t01++;
			}
			ss<<"Lucky Chef\n";
			ss<<max(t01,t10)<<"\n";
		}
	}
	cout<<ss.str()<<endl;
}
